description: Audio notification hooks for Claude Code

hooks.command: python -c "import os,sys,subprocess,platform; p=os.path.join(os.environ.get('CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT','.'), 'sounds', 'claude_startup.wav'); subprocess.run(['powershell.exe','-c',f\"(New-Object Media.SoundPlayer '{p}').PlaySync()\"] if platform.system()=='Windows' else ['afplay',p], capture_output=True)" 2>/dev/null
